info.description: This is a comprehensive API for the EasyCourt system.
info.title: EasyCourt API

get.description: Retrieves all bookings with pagination support

post.description: Creates a new booking based on the provided payload

get.description: Retrieves a specific booking by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing booking based on the provided payload

delete.description: Deletes a booking by its ID

put.description: Updates the data of an existing court

post.description: Creates a new court with the provided data

get.description: Retrieves all the courts from a location.
Retrieves a court by its ID

delete.description: Deletes a court based on the given ID

get.description: Get a list of all locations

put.description: Update the details of a location

post.description: Create a new location with the provided information

delete.description: Delete a location by its ID

post.description: Upload an image file for a specific location and store it in S3

200.description: Returns a success message and the URL of the uploaded image

post.description: Authenticate a user and return access and refresh tokens
Use a refresh token to obtain a new access token and refresh token pair
Creates a new timeslot in the system

get.description: Retrieves all timeslots for a specific court

200.description: List of timeslots for the court

get.description: Retrieves a single timeslot by its ID

put.description: Updates the details of an existing timeslot

delete.description: Deletes a timeslot by its ID

get.description: Get a list of all users

put.description: Update the details of a user

post.description: Create a new user with the provided information

get.description: Get details of a user by their ID

delete.description: Delete a user by their ID

valid.description: Valid is true if Time is not NULL
